title: Riot Support Person is a Bot
body: Can I have a real Riot support person answer me?

replies.body:
Hey Navy Blue Fire,

It looks like Itachi, the player support guy, misunderstood what you meant. Since you're playing on NA, you cannot change your name to the umlauts as those characters are not supported on the NA server. You can read more about this [here. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ#h1q4)

Let me know if you have any other questions. Otherwise, Good luck on the Fields of Justice!
You can buy a summoner name change in game, they don't do it for free.

Allowing special characters would definitely get people to change their names, meaning purchasing RP, meaning Riot gets money. Riot needs to up their ideas about getting money if that's what they really want.

Some people already do use special characters though. lol

Edit: "ideas up about money if that's what they really want". Nope. They said it before. They'd rather have your time than your money, thus why the game is mostly free to play rather than paying to play it all the time like World of Warcraft.

Ok, I'm not Riot but I can't recall seeing anyone with characters like that in the game so I'm leaning towards no. Riot doesn't really answer many posts here, they're more interested in promotional crap to keep people paying them money.

That isn't the question...

The question was, can I change my summoner name to a name with umlauts?

I didn't ask to change my name.
